Name: Nirina
description:
Nirina is a young man aged 24. He is in a relationship. He is responsible for one child. The family owns a mud house in a rural neighborhood. The couple farm and raise livestock. He has already been working with Vahatra for several years to obtain financial support.
For this new loan, they will be raising livestock and growing potatoes. He will buy four pigs to fatten with 1,200 kg of feed, 200 kg of potato seed, 20 carts of manure and 20 kg of NPK. And the family will benefit from health insurance with this loan.
He plans to sell his pigs to the town butcher at the end of the fattening process. The potatoes will be delivered to collectors after growing for a few months.
He will continue to save his earnings. He plans to build a brick house for his family.
